correspondence.message: I need clarification on the thesis submission process. Is the address for the ‘Academic Programs Office—Informatics’ correct for submitting my thesis? Also, is the deadline for submitting the printed version of the thesis applicable for my situation since I submitted my thesis on the portal but not in printed form?"
You do not need to submit a physical copy of your thesis since it was registered via the CIT portal. Submitting it on time in the portal is sufficient.
